alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 9:10AM AKST until December 24 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING THROUGH THOMPSON PASS... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Thompson Pass. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation has become more showery in Valdez and Thompson Pass, with frequent changes in intensity. Rain in town will change back to snow by this afternoon while snow persists through Thompson Pass.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
